name: Bomb
baseEffect: Thrown (range 15/30), 10ft. radius. 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Dexterity Save vs Concoction DC for half damage.

name: Dust
baseEffect: Apply to 45 sq. ft. area, lasts for 1 hour or until it is removed by weather or a similar effect. Effect is applied when a creature or object moves onto a 5ft area of dust, which is then consumed.

name: Oil
baseEffect: Apply to a weapon or object, taking one minute and lasts for an hour. When the coated item hits a creature, the effect is applied to that creature.

name: Potion
baseEffect: Bonus action to drink, action to feed to another creature. Effect is applied to the creature which drinks the potion.
